channel.title: 508 client error
channel.description:
i downloaded a client from the download forums thing
and i tryd to run it than i get this error i get the screen but its all white
error:signlink:233 signlink:372 applet_sub1:338 client:2196 :java.lang.runtime exception
thats the error i get if i run it i dont now mutch about 508 but im learning please any 1 who could help
thanks anyway killerrex34
